name: Stellario
description:
In a large star field, the Spirit flies around and absorbs stars to build up mass and take on a different appearance. But you have to be careful on the journey - there are black holes scattered around the field, and also spaceships flying at unthinkable speeds.
Pump up the Spirit's species and the speed of the game with pleasant music." The game is similar to snake, you need to collect stars and pump up your character. Also you will be able to buy new characters with in-game currency.

Features:
- pleasant graphics;
- simple controls;
- interesting gameplay;
- pleasant musical accompaniment.
